title: "Monster" Excitement Heads into New Britain!
text:
"Monster" Excitement Heads into New Britain! Where 
9:00 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 Categories 
Events, Sports New Britain, there’s a monster heading your way—a monster truck, that is! On Saturday, October 10 at 9:00am - 5:00pm to Sunday, October 11 at 10:00am- 5:00pm, check out what the excitement is all about when the legendary Ram sponsored monster truck, Raminator rolls into Papas Chrysler Dodge Jeep Ram, 585 E Main St. Check out the power behind the wheels during the car crushes Sunday, 12:00pm-2:00pm!Guests of all ages are invited to see how they measure up against the towering 5’5’’ tires, meet the talent behind the wheel and receive an autograph and take a photo with a member of the Hall Brothers Racing team. Since 2002, two of the most iconic and most feared opponents in monster truck racing have been sponsored by the Ram Truck brand—Raminator and Rammunition. In December 2014, Raminator and Driver Mark Hall broke the GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS® record for the Fastest Speed for a Monster Truck, hitting a record speed of 99.10 miles per hour. For more information on the Ram Monster Truck lineup, visit Raminator.com.
